body:
Comment 1: 
Note that the first program (the one that causes a syntax error) is valid according to
the grammar in the spec.

Starting from: http://golang.org/ref/spec#If_statements

Producing the terms:
IfStmt -> Expression -> UnaryExpr -> PrimaryExpr -> Operand -> Literal -> CompositeLit

Leads to: http://golang.org/ref/spec#Composite_literals
